metadata.title: CVE-2017-6802 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.2. There is a potentialheap-based buffer over-read on incoming Compressed RTF Streams, related toDecompressRTF() in libytnef.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.5-9ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-9ubuntu0.1').
